name: Neon_Dream
description:
Game Lore:

Can you Run from the Destroying city

Your Name is "Glu", you brought  a  nice bike then ,all of a sudden city start's collapsing  , Can you Escape!

Controlling

Swipe Up - No Slow motion

Swipe Down - Slow motion

Swipe Left - Go Left

Swipe Right - Go right

Tap-  idle
